p: Extraction of the first 3 PCs afforded to a cumulative explained variance of almost 90% (PC1:61.18%; PC1 + PC2: 75.02%; PC1 + PC2 + PC3: 82.92%). As reported [ 22], the first two principal components indicate at least three clusters ( Supplementary Material Figure SM-1) and correctly identified the three plants derived EOs, although no definite separation between RSEOs and FVEOs was observable. PCA related loading plots indicated estragole, o-cymene and pulegone as the chemical components mainly related to high PCs values ( Supplementary Material Figure SM-1).
